gov.nih.nlm.bioscores.core

Class CoreferenceSemanticItemFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nih.nlm.ling.sem.SemanticItemFactory
      • gov.nih.nlm.bioscores.core.CoreferenceSemanticItemFactory

  • public class CoreferenceSemanticItemFactory
extends SemanticItemFactory
    Class to create semantic objects specific to coreference, such as expressions and coreference chains.
    Author:
    Halil Kilicoglu

    • Method Detail

      • newCoreferenceChain

        public CoreferenceChain newCoreferenceChain(Document doc,
                                            RelationAnnotation rel)
        Creates a new CoreferenceChain from an existing standoff RelationAnnotation object.

        If the objects referenced by rel annotation (e.g., terms or events) do not exist yet, it will create these objects first.

        Parameters:
        doc - the document that the coreference relation is associated with
        rel - the corresponding RelationAnnotation object
        Returns:
        a new CoreferenceChain object

      • newCoreferenceChain

        public CoreferenceChain newCoreferenceChain(Document doc,
                                            java.lang.String type,
                                            java.util.List<Argument> args)
        Creates a new CoreferenceChain object from a list or arguments.
        Parameters:
        doc - the document that the coreference relation is associated with
        type - the specific coreference type
        args - the arguments of the coreference relation
        Returns:
        a CoreferenceChain object with the given arguments and type

      • newExpression

        public Expression newExpression(Document doc,
                                TermAnnotation t)
        Creates a new Expression object from an existing standoff TermAnnotation object.
        Parameters:
        doc - the document that the expression is associated with
        t - the corresponding TermAnnotation standoff annotation
        Returns:
        a Expression object

      • newExpression

        public Expression newExpression(Document doc,
                                java.lang.String type,
                                SpanList sp,
                                SpanList headSp,
                                java.lang.String text)
        Creates a new Expression object from type and span information.
        Parameters:
        doc - the document that the coreferential expression is associated with
        type - the specific type of the coreferential expression
        sp - the span of the term
        headSp - the head span of term
        text - the text of the term
        Returns:
        a Expression object

      • newExpression

        public Expression newExpression(Document doc,
                                java.lang.String type,
                                SurfaceElement se)
        Creates a new Expression object from type and textual unit information.

        If the type specified for the mention is unrecognized, it will attempt to identify the fine-grained type.

        Parameters:
        doc - the document that the mention is associated with
        type - the specific type of the coref. mention
        se - the corresponding textual unit
        Returns:
        a Expression object

      • newExpression

        public Expression newExpression(Document doc,
                                ExpressionType type,
                                SurfaceElement se)
        Creates a new Expression object from type and textual unit information.

        It also attempts to attach conceptual semantics attached to the textual unit se to the coreferential expression, so that such information can be used in coreference agreement computation. Semantics attached to the textual unit is assumed to be entity semantics.

        Parameters:
        doc - the document that the mention is associated with
        type - the specific type of the coref. mention
        se - the corresponding textual unit
        Returns:
        a Expression object
